sqlMap.sql: INSERT INTO px_apply_info(itemId, address, `name`, type, mobile, applyId, certificateType, certificateCode, createTime, sourceFrom, organizationName,userId,childName,childBirth,childSex,addrId,applyItemId) values (:itemId, :address, :name, :type, :mobile, :applyId, :certificateType, :certificateCode, :createTime, :sourceFrom, :organizationName, :userId,:childName,:childBirth,:childSex,:addrId,:applyItemId)

UPDATE px_apply_info SET address = :address <#if name?exists && name != ""> , `name` = :name </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> , type = :type </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> , mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> , certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> , certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> , createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> , sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> , organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> , `status` = :status </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> , userId = :userId </#if> WHERE applyId = :applyId

DELETE FROM px_apply_info WHERE 1=1 <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND `name` = :name </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND `itemId` = :itemId </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if>

SELECT address, itemId, `name`, userId, type, mobile, applyId, certificateType, certificateCode, createTime, sourceFrom, organizationName, status,childName,childBirth,childSex,addrId,applyItemId, (select a.addrName from px_study_address a where a.addrId = px_apply_info.addrId) addrName FROM px_apply_info WHERE 1=1 <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND `name` = :name </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> AND status = :status </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND itemId = :itemId </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM px_apply_info WHERE 1=1 <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND `name` = :name </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> AND status = :status </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND itemId = :itemId </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy !="" > ORDER BY :orderBy <#if orderType?exists && orderType !="" > :orderType </#if> </#if>

SELECT address, `name`, type, mobile, userId, applyId, certificateType, certificateCode, createTime, sourceFrom, organizationName, status, itemId FROM px_apply_info WHERE 1=1 <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND `name` = :name </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND `userId` = :userId </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> AND status = :status </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND itemId = :itemId </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy!="" && orderType?exists> ORDER BY :orderBy :orderType </#if> <#if startIndex?exists && startIndex !="" && maxCount?exists && maxCount !="" > LIMIT :startIndex,:maxCount </#if>

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM px_apply_info WHERE 1=1 <#if address?exists && address != ""> AND address = :address </#if> <#if name?exists && name != ""> AND `name` = :name </#if> <#if type?exists && type != ""> AND type = :type </#if> <#if userId?exists && userId != ""> AND userId = :userId </#if> <#if mobile?exists && mobile != ""> AND mobile = :mobile </#if> <#if certificateType?exists && certificateType != ""> AND certificateType = :certificateType </#if> <#if certificateCode?exists && certificateCode != ""> AND certificateCode = :certificateCode </#if> <#if createTime?exists && createTime != ""> AND createTime = :createTime </#if> <#if sourceFrom?exists && sourceFrom != ""> AND sourceFrom = :sourceFrom </#if> <#if organizationName?exists && organizationName != ""> AND organizationName = :organizationName </#if> <#if status?exists && status != ""> AND status = :status </#if> <#if applyId?exists && applyId != ""> AND applyId = :applyId </#if> <#if itemId?exists && itemId != ""> AND itemId = :itemId </#if> <#if orderBy?exists && orderBy!="" && orderType?exists> ORDER BY :orderBy :orderType </#if>
